Player History
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Storm Davis (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1985, off Rick Waits (PHI)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1985, hitting .337 with 12 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1985, hitting .320 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/1985, hitting .550 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1985, hitting .348 with 11 HR, 27 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/1985, hitting .455 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $9,640,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/1986, hitting .455 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1986, hitting .320 with 14 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1986, hitting .340 with 9 HR, 16 RBI...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1986...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 1986, hitting .298 with 39 HR, 107 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1986...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $9,640,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/1987, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago on 7/12/1987...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $9,640,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/8/1988 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
9/1/1988: Signed a contract extension with New York (M), $12,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1989, hitting .462 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/1989, hitting .318 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won World Series with New York (M) in 1989...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1989...
Injured on 5/21/1990 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
